Room.Name: Madam Nicolov's Wagon
Room.ShortDescription: This room is ominously wallpapered with charts of the human head.
Room.LongDescription: Madame Nicolov is a world famous phrenologist who has given lectures at all of the great universities on the meaning of head bumps and methods for reading them. A very low chair is in the center of the room, and another, higher chair is directly behind it. Standing nearby is an armature with a human head mounted on it. The mouth looks about ready to speak, but the eyes are closed and the head remains silent.
